Test Functions¶

scripts.test_functions.add_one(x)[source]¶

Adds one to a number and returns the result.

Parameters:kind (int) – Number to incremented
Raise:ValueError: if x is non-numeric
Returns:incremented value
Return type:int
scripts.test_functions.subtract_one(x)[source]¶

Subtracts one to a number and returns the result.

Parameters:kind (int) – Number to decremented
Raises:ValueError – if x is non-numeric
Returns:decremented value
Return type:int
